info.title: Punjabi Palace API
info.description: This is the API documentation for the Restaurant management application.

post.description: Authenticate a user and return an access token
Change password for the current logged in user
Send mail for the forgot password link to change password for current user email
Reset the user's password using a valid token.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Password reset token received via email

400.description: Invalid token or user not found
Category is assigned to a menu and cannot be deleted

message.example: This category is assigned to a menu and cannot be deleted.

get.summary: Get all menus based on category
Get menu items by menu ID or all menu items

parameters.name: menu_id
parameters.description: Optional ID to filter menu items by menu_id. If not provided, all menu items will be returned.

400.description: Bad request. Invalid data or parameters.
Bad request. Invalid data or parameters.
Bad request. Invalid data or parameters.

description.example: This attribute signifies a vegetarian dish.

description.example: This attribute signifies a vegetarian dish.
